DOC.brief_summary: Procalcitonin (PCT) serum levels are monitored in patients with secondary peritonitis after initial operative focus elimination to investigate the PCT ratio's impact on decision-making for or against early relaparotomy in the on-demand relaparotomy concept of secondary septic peritonitis.
DOC.brief_title: Procalcitonin Ratio's Impact on the Decision Upon On-demand Relaparotomy in Septic Peritonitis
DOC.criteria: age >18 years necessity for operative intervention to eliminate an infectious peritoneal / abdominal focus after organ perforation abdominal sepsis according to the American College of Chest Physicians/Society of Critical Care Medicine Consensus Conference definition pregnancy immunosuppressive medication
